name: This Is Fine (CodeLikeASir, nikame, Qu0d0, upfall)
name_original: This Is Fine (CodeLikeASir, nikame, Qu0d0, upfall)
description:
This game was created as part of the Ubisoft Berlin Game Jam 2021.

Description

Your campfire has gone out, but luckily you managed to find a burning tree. Your problem: This tree is on the other end of the forest. Try to control the spread of the fire towards your campfire without burning down the whole forest.

Controls

Control
Keyboard & Mouse
Xbox Gamepad
MoveWASDLeft Stick
Look/AimMouseRight Stick
BlowBlow/Scream in your microphone!
or SpaceA

Credits

  • Annika Meeß - Programming, UI Art & Design
  • Henrik Tietjens - Game Design, Level Design, Programming, Character Art
  • Jan Meissner - Game Design, Programming, Tech Art, Level Design
  • Quirin Maier - Game Design, Level Design, Programming
